The Quranic researcher took place from them, that is: what they denied them and did not blame.And in the uniqueness of the desires, it is said: I have been emitted if you denied it with your tongue or with a punishment.Zaid bin Ali and Abu Hayyah and Ibn Abi Abla read and what: “Come on” by breaking the endowment.The name is for its struggle in the way, as it was a past, so the kindness was a verb on actual acts.It was said: This is the actual estimated: and they are what they have erased from them.Except that they believe in God, the Head of Himid With us, there is no one from the rhythm of the cords and the unbelief of the disbelief.The curriculum is from the affirmation of the praise with what is similar to the defamation, then the people, if they are partners, then the denunciation of them is not the faith in God, but the exalted, but the exile of the one who has exiled And if they were disturbed, then the denial of them is only to prove the worshipers other than them, but when the money of the two things was the denial of the slave of the slave of the slave of the slave of the slave of the slave of the He crossed what was mentioned in a disclosure of what you heard and contemplated.And for some flags, there are words in this place, which was rejected by the meteors, so if you wanted it, he will return to it.And in the adaptation, but his grace said: Except that they believe that the torment was based on faith in the future, and if they disbelieved in it, they did not torture, so they did not torture.Except that they are ending in their faith.As if he carried the vengeance of the denial of the punishment, and his description is a glory and a long -term form of it, he feared his punishment, and a blessed praise, and he will be rewarded.By saying it:
